org.apache.sysml.runtime.compress

Class ColGroupDDC1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sysml.runtime.compress.ColGroup
      • org.apache.sysml.runtime.compress.ColGroupValue
        • org.apache.sysml.runtime.compress.ColGroupDDC
          • org.apache.sysml.runtime.compress.ColGroupDDC1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ColGroupDDC1
extends ColGroupDDC
    Class to encapsulate information about a column group that is encoded with dense dictionary encoding (DDC) using 1 byte codes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
